description: KeeTheme Plugin changes the appearance of KeePass, to make it look better at night.

installer.script: Get-Process -Name KeePass -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force -Verbose; Copy-Item "$dir\KeeTheme*" "$(appdir keepass $global)\current\Plugins\"; KeePass

uninstaller.script: Get-Process -Name KeePass -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force -Verbose; Get-Item "$(appdir keepass $global)\current\Plugins\KeeTheme*" | Remove-Item -Force; KeePass
